dc:description: Pyxis in good condition. Bucchero ware. Krater-like shape, with flat, near square handles each wit two oval holes in it. Closely packed incised vertical lines cover the entire surface, except for the foot and neck of the piece.
Gazda: Personal storage box (pyxis). Clay, bucchero sottile with incised decoration.
